documentation.text:
@title ITournamentRankings
 @dev Interface for tournament ranking functionality
@dev Emitted when a rank is recorded

@dev Get the contract owner
 @return The owner address
@dev Mapping of tournament ID to player address to rank
@dev Contract owner with exclusive modification rights
@dev Constructor sets the contract deployer as owner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "TournamentRankings: caller is not the owner"

arguments.value: TournamentRankings: caller is not the owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TournamentRankings: caller is not the owner"

documentation.text: @dev Modifier to restrict access to owner only
